name: Legacy Pack
description:
Legacy Pack

Welcome to my legacy pack! This pack contains 20 games that I "released" before 2017. I no longer find these games to be up to my standards and as such have consolidated them into this pack for you to enjoy instead of listing them seperately. Each game comes with a short text file describing it. Enjoy! 

DISCLAIMER: SOME OF THESE GAMES MAY BE BUGGY, BROKEN, AWFUL OR POLITICALLY INCORRECT. I DO NOT INTEND TO FIX, CHANGE OR ADAPT ANY OF THEM ANYMORE AND THEY NO LONGER REPRESENT MY CURRENT VIEWS AND/OR OPINIONS.
